description: The clown attacks have continued and FBI agent, Holly Hendrix packs them into holding because of her deep fear of clowns. She visits her therapist who encourages her to do something that gives her pleasant thoughts while being around the jailed clown freaks! Holly jacks her cunt off right in front of the holding cell to get over her fear and ends up in a full on crazed clown gangbang filled with double penetration, DAP and fisting!!
title: When Clowns Attack: FBI agent gets double anal and fisting!!
